name: Dune Punk! (SuitsnNukes)
description:
Master the dunes as you fight to survive  aboard a wind-powered fantasy sand sailing craft. Maneuver at breakneck speeds and launch high into the air to perform insane stunts while fighting hideous beast that spring from the sands! In the post nuclear wasteland, it takes a gang of cutthroats and misfits watching each other's back, will you move swift enough to overcome the perils that await?

- Huge area to free roam with 7 unlockable music tracks, 2 worm battle missions and 28 unlockables to find!
- Ability to get ON and OFF the sandglider -- full third person movement now added!
-Day/Night progression
- Grind rails and launch off boost pads for maximum speed!
-Additional powerups like advanced firepower and flight!
- Talk to crew members aboard your mobile command base -- the sand catamaran!
- Controller support only
- Several camera modes, including first person!
